original_text: The elders of Moab and Midian left, taking with them the fee for divination. When they came to Balaam, they told him what Balak had said.
korean_text: 모압 장로들과 미디안 장로들이 손에 복채를 가지고 떠나 발람에게 이르러 발락의 말을 그에게 전하매

sentences.original_text: The elders of Moab and Midian left
taking with them the fee for divination
they told him what Balak had said
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 발락이 말한 것을 그에게 말했습니다
